item.title: Example FAERS Project Setup
item.description: Downloading data and working with large data sets can be a challenge, especially when the data require aggregation. Overtime column names or file naming conventions may change, which lead to potential errors in the aggregation process. Other data sets involve so many files that it is impractical to forego automation. In the biomedical sciences, there are many publically available Databases, Resources & APIs at the U.S. National Library of Medicine and U.
